verses.verse: And I looked, <WG3708> and behold, <WG2400> the Lamb <WG721> [was] standing <WG2476> on Mount <WG3735> Zion, <WG4622> and with Him one <WG1540> hundred <WG1540> and forty-four thousand, <WG5505> having <WG2192> His name <WG3686> and the name <WG3686> of His Father <WG3962> written <WG1125> on their foreheads. <WG3359>

And I heard <WG191> a voice <WG5456> from heaven, <WG3772> like <WG5613> the sound <WG5456> of many <WG4183> waters <WG5204> and like <WG5613> the sound <WG5456> of loud <WG3173> thunder, <WG1027> and the voice <WG5456> which <WG3739> I heard <WG191> [was] like <WG5613> [the sound] of harpists <WG2790> playing <WG2789> on their harps. <WG2788>

And they sang <WG103> a new <WG2537> song <WG5603> before <WG1799> the throne <WG2362> and before <WG1799> the four <WG5064> living <WG2226> creatures <WG2226> and the elders; <WG4245> and no <WG3762> one <WG3762> could <WG1410> learn <WG3129> the song <WG5603> except <WG1508> the one <WG1540> hundred <WG1540> and forty-four thousand <WG5505> who had been purchased <WG59> from the earth. <WG1093>

These <WG3778> are the ones who <WG3739> have not been defiled <WG3435> with women, <WG1135> for they have kept themselves <WG1510> chaste. <WG3933> These <WG3778> [are] the ones who follow <WG190> the Lamb <WG721> wherever <WG3699> <WG302> He goes. <WG5217> These <WG3778> have been purchased <WG59> from among <WG575> men <WG444> as first <WG536> fruits <WG536> to God <WG2316> and to the Lamb. <WG721>
And no <WG3756> lie <WG5579> was found <WG2147> in their mouth; <WG4750> they are blameless. <WG299>

And I saw <WG3708> another <WG243> angel <WG32> flying <WG4072> in midheaven, <WG3321> having <WG2192> an eternal <WG166> gospel <WG2098> to preach <WG2097> to those <WG3588> who live <WG2521> on the earth, <WG1093> and to every <WG3956> nation <WG1484> and tribe <WG5443> and tongue <WG1100> and people; <WG2992>

and he said <WG3004> with a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> "Fear <WG5399> God, <WG2316> and give <WG1325> Him glory, <WG1391> because <WG3754> the hour <WG5610> of His judgment <WG2920> has come; <WG2064> and worship <WG4352> Him who made <WG4160> the heaven <WG3772> and the earth <WG1093> and sea <WG2281> and springs <WG4077> of waters."

And another <WG243> angel, <WG32> a second <WG1208> one, <WG1208> followed, <WG190> saying, <WG3004> "Fallen, <WG4098> fallen <WG4098> is Babylon <WG897> the great, <WG3173> she who <WG3739> has made <WG4222> all <WG3956> the nations <WG1484> drink <WG4222> of the wine <WG3631> of the passion <WG2372> of her immorality. <WG4202>"

And another <WG243> angel, <WG32> a third <WG5154> one, <WG5154> followed <WG190> them, saying <WG3004> with a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456> "If <WG1487> anyone <WG5100> worships <WG4352> the beast <WG2342> and his image, <WG1504> and receives <WG2983> a mark <WG5480> on his forehead <WG3359> or <WG2228> upon his hand, <WG5495>

he also <WG2532> will drink <WG4095> of the wine <WG3631> of the wrath <WG2372> of God, <WG2316> which is mixed <WG2767> in full <WG194> strength <WG194> in the cup <WG4221> of His anger; <WG3709> and he will be tormented <WG928> with fire <WG4442> and brimstone <WG2303> in the presence <WG1799> of the holy <WG40> angels <WG32> and in the presence <WG1799> of the Lamb. <WG721>

"And the smoke <WG2586> of their torment <WG929> goes <WG305> up forever <WG165> and ever; <WG165> and they have <WG2192> no <WG3756> rest <WG372> day <WG2250> and night, <WG3571> those <WG3588> who worship <WG4352> the beast <WG2342> and his image, <WG1504> and whoever <WG1487> <WG5100> receives <WG2983> the mark <WG5480> of his name. <WG3686>"
Here <WG5602> is the perseverance <WG5281> of the saints <WG40> who keep <WG5083> the commandments <WG1785> of God <WG2316> and their faith <WG4102> in Jesus. <WG2424>

And I heard <WG191> a voice <WG5456> from heaven, <WG3772> saying, <WG3004> "Write, <WG1125> 'Blessed <WG3107> are the dead <WG3498> who die <WG599> in the Lord <WG2962> from now <WG737> on!'" "Yes, <WG3483>" says <WG3004> the Spirit, <WG4151> "that they may rest <WG373> from their labors, <WG2873> for their deeds <WG2041> follow <WG190> with them."

And I looked, <WG3708> and behold, <WG2400> a white <WG3022> cloud, <WG3507> and sitting <WG2521> on the cloud <WG3507> [was] one <WG3664> like <WG3664> a son <WG5207> of man, <WG444> having <WG2192> a golden <WG5552> crown <WG4735> on His head, <WG2776> and a sharp <WG3691> sickle <WG1407> in His hand. <WG5495>

And another <WG243> angel <WG32> came <WG1831> out of the temple, <WG3485> crying <WG2896> out with a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456> to Him who sat <WG2521> on the cloud, <WG3507> "Put <WG3992> in your sickle <WG1407> and reap, <WG2325> because <WG3754> the hour <WG5610> to reap <WG2325> has come, <WG2064> because <WG3754> the harvest <WG2326> of the earth <WG1093> is ripe. <WG3583>"
And He who sat <WG2521> on the cloud <WG3507> swung <WG906> His sickle <WG1407> over <WG1909> the earth; <WG1093> and the earth <WG1093> was reaped. <WG2325>
And another <WG243> angel <WG32> came <WG1831> out of the temple <WG3485> which <WG3588> is in heaven, <WG3772> and he also <WG2532> had <WG2192> a sharp <WG3691> sickle. <WG1407>

And another <WG243> angel, <WG32> the one who has <WG2192> power <WG1849> over <WG1909> fire, <WG4442> came <WG1831> out from the altar; <WG2379> and he called <WG5455> with a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456> to him who had <WG2192> the sharp <WG3691> sickle, <WG1407> saying, <WG3004> "Put <WG3992> in your sharp <WG3691> sickle, <WG1407> and gather <WG5166> the clusters <WG1009> from the vine <WG288> of the earth, <WG1093> because <WG3754> her grapes <WG4718> are ripe. <WG187>"

And the angel <WG32> swung <WG906> his sickle <WG1407> to the earth, <WG1093> and gathered <WG5166> [the clusters from] the vine <WG288> of the earth, <WG1093> and threw <WG906> them into the great <WG3173> wine <WG3025> press <WG3025> of the wrath <WG2372> of God. <WG2316>

And the wine <WG3025> press <WG3025> was trodden <WG3961> outside <WG1855> the city, <WG4172> and blood <WG129> came <WG1831> out from the wine <WG3025> press, <WG3025> up to the horses' bridles, <WG5469> for a distance <WG575> of two <WG1812> hundred miles. <WG4712>
